===Etymology===
* ''c.'' '''385 {{B.C.E.}} - 289 {{B.C.E.}}:''' ''anon'', ''[[w:Mencius|Mencius]]: Devoting one's energies (part one)'' ([[:zh:s:孟子/盡心上|孟子/盡心上]])
*: [[孟子]][[曰]]：[[孔子]][[登]][[東山]][[而]][[小]][[魯]]，'''登泰山而小天下'''。 (''[[Traditional Chinese|trad.]]'')
*: &nbsp;
*: [[孟子]][[曰]]：[[孔子]][[登]][[东山]][[而]][[小]][[鲁]]，'''登泰山而小天下'''。 (''[[Simplified Chinese|simp.]]'')
*:: ''[[w:Mencius|Mencius]] said, "Having climbed the East Peak (of [[w:Mount Tai|Mount Tai]]), [[w:Lu (state)|Lu]] seemed small to [[w:Confucius|Confucius]]. '''Having climbed to the top of [[w:Mount Tai|Mount Tai]], the whole world below seemed small'''''. (Wiktionary translation)
